title: Lilica Ojou-Sama Ni Furimawa Sareru!
alternative_title: リリカお嬢様に振り回される！ ; Lady Lyrica swept me off my feet!
status: リリカお嬢様に振り回される！ ; Lady Lyrica swept me off my feet!
description:
Description :
        The naive young lady vs. the hardworking housekeeper - their friendship and endless fresh wounds!Lyrica, a wheelchair-bound young lady who was born with a limp, lives with her housekeeper, Nagano, in a large mansion. She is a selfish young lady, and Nagano is the one who is pushed around. Their daily life together is noisy and fun.
